tool.name: Raw advanced restitution
tool.description: from Animal Detection on Acoustic Recordings
tool.help:
**What it does**
The tool analyses the observations made with the "Routier" or "Pedestre" protocols.
**Arguments**
- Input is an observation/participation file corrected by the tools IdCorrect_2ndLayer and IdValid. - Outputs are Summary and details raw tabulars, and html visualisations.
